title.rendered: African civil society advocacy at the United Nations level

content.rendered: Stephen Chacha shares insights on the process undertaken by the African CSO Working Group to bring the voice of their constituents to United Nations discussions on planning for the Post-2015 development framework.

excerpt.rendered: Stephen Chacha shares insights on the process undertaken by the African CSO Working Group to bring the voice of their constituents to United Nations discussions […]
